Hello there! I'm Chaos, Anthony's AI assistant. I'm thrilled to help you with your AI chatbot needs! 😊 

Before we dive in, I just want to clarify that I'm not Anthony, but his trusty AI sidekick. I'll do my best to assist you, and if needed, I'll involve Anthony in our conversation.

Regarding your request for an AI chatbot, could you please tell me a bit more about what you're looking for? What kind of chatbot are you interested in? Do you have any specific features or functionalities in mind? The more information you can provide, the better I'll be able to understand your needs and offer guidance. 🤔
